fulltext:
EDUCATION 
Bachelor Software Engineering 
Duy Tan University | 09/ 2010 - 06/ 2014 
Lap Nguyen 
Quality Assurance Engineer 
SUMMARY 
Five year of experience in 
WebService/Mobile Application 
Testing. Have basic knowledge 
about automation testing. 
Familiar with Object-Oriented 
Programming in .Net and Java. 
Have good experiences in both 
Black Box and White Box testing 
methodology . Be interested in 
researching new technologies of 
the projects in order to support 
developing and testing system. 
Patient and non-judgmental . 
Work well in team or individual. 
Possessing inter-personal and 
communication skills and is 
approachable, cheerful and 
friendly. 
SKILLS 
Mobile & Web 
testing 
Windows 
appication 
testing 
Defect & Bug 
Discovery 
Multi-platform 
testing 
Tracking, 
logging & 
reporting 
Fresher QA Engineer 
FPT Software Danang | 11/ 2014 - 12/ 2015 
Read and analyze the requirements from projects. 
Join Scrum meetings with Dev team , QA with customer to clarify and confirm the unclear 
points. 
Create , review and update test cases after confirmation. Execute test 
cases and report to Tickering system 
Interacting with Dev team during testing and report immediately when encountering 
problems. 
Training with Dev team to gain knowledge about the projects. Create new 
test cases based on bugs/Create data tests. 
Perform regression testing after receiving new build/feature. 
Perform smoke testing , blind testing when receiving new functions/ feature. Report 
and retest bug , communicate with Dev team via Trello/Jira. 
QA Engineer 
Global Cybersoft Danang | 01/ 2016 - 01/ 2017 
Perform smoke, interface, regression, testing on dozens of web/windows applications using 
manual testing methods. 
Direct meeting with dev team to point out the issues as well as solving 
conflict/misunderstanding between dev and QA team. 
QA Engineer 
Logigear Da Nang | 07/ 2017 - Present 
Read and analyze the requirements from projects. 
Build up test cases, test suites and update them based on the provided requirements. 
Perform smoke, ad-hoc, localize testing on dozens of mobile applications (android/iOS). 
File defect/issue on local bug tracking system and do a regression, bug verification after 
receiving new build from client. 
Create new test cases based on bugs. 
Check client mails to collect and assign tasks,join daily meeting from customer on US site 
and have a knowledge sharing after the meeting. 
EXPERIENCES 
PROJECTS 
FPT Software Danang' project name & description : PGRS 
,PGAUTH, Policy Enforcer 
1. PGRS: A DirecTV system which is designed to be Program Guide 
metadata history archival ,search , query and change tracking. 
2. PGAuth:A system that provides authorization for download/streaming nonlinear 
content. 
3. Policy Enforcer: A new System being introduced along with Policy server, 
this will serve assystem which will be responsible for authorization and 
geo-location determination. 
Global Cybersoft Danang' project name & description : TAMAGO 
1. TAMAGO : A project management system which is design to create and manage 
project , task(create project , create - assign task , ... ) on multi-platform (iOS, 
Android , Window) 
LogiGear Danang' project name & description : Anki Overdrive, Geocaching, 
1. Anki Overdrive: A racing robot system is an intelligent battle track with AI 
vehicles. These self-aware cars and trucks learn as you race on the 
OVERDRIVE real-life track. 
2. Geocaching: Geocaching is a real-world, outdoor treasure hunting game 
using GPS-enabled devices. Participants navigate to a specific set of GPS 
coordinates and then attempt to find the geocache (container) hidden at that 
location. 
LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese 
Native 
English 
Fluent 
INTERESTS 
Music, Cycling, Photographing 
Preparing and reviewing local bugs before logging it on client system, as well as review 
daily report before sending to client. 
Report and retest bug , communicate with Dev team via Trello/Jira.
